name: Pac Jump
description:
My first game I've published, I hope you enjoy it.

Pac Jump is a frustratingly hard platformer made in game maker which started out as a school project and became a recognised title across the school and so I decided to make it available to anyone else who wants to test their platformer skill. If I could just get 100 downloads, it would mean the world to me.

Any advice or tips for improvement would be greatly appreciated. Good luck.
